name: Wireless Noise-Cancelling Headphones
description: Premium over-ear headphones with active noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: Adjustable chair with lumbar support and breathable mesh for long work sessions.

description: Vibrant 4K display with smart TV features, built-in streaming apps.

name: Organic Cotton Bedding Set
description: Soft and breathable duvet cover and pillowcases, made from 100% organic cotton.

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Compact and powerful speaker with rich bass and 12-hour playtime. Water-resistant.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Insulated water bottle keeping drinks cold for 24h and hot for 12h. 750ml.

name: Gaming Laptop (RTX 4070)
description: High-performance gaming laptop with NVIDIA RTX 4070, Intel i7, 16GB RAM.

name: Yoga Mat (Non-slip)
description: Thick, comfortable, and non-slip yoga mat for all types of yoga and fitness.

name: Electric Coffee Grinder
description: Compact electric grinder with adjustable settings for various brew types.

name: External SSD 1TB (USB-C)
description: Fast and portable solid-state drive with USB-C connectivity, 1TB storage.

name: Smart Watch
description: Fitness tracker and notification display watch with heart rate monitor.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: Gaming mechanical keyboard with RGB lighting and clicky switches.

name: Travel Backpack
description: Durable and spacious backpack for travel, with multiple compartments and laptop sleeve.

name: Bluetooth Earbuds
description: Compact wireless earbuds with great sound and 6 hours battery life.

name: Desk Lamp with Wireless Charger
description: Modern desk lamp with adjustable brightness and integrated wireless phone charger.

name: Resistance Bands Set
description: Set of 5 varying resistance bands for full body workouts.

name: Digital Camera
description: Entry-level mirrorless camera with 24MP sensor and 4K video.

name: Air Fryer
description: 5.8-quart air fryer for healthy cooking, with digital touchscreen.

name: Smart Doorbell
description: Video doorbell with motion detection, two-way talk, and cloud storage.

description: Automated vacuum cleaner with smart mapping and app control.

description: Protective neoprene sleeve for 13-inch laptops, slim and durable.

name: External Hard Drive 2TB
description: High-capacity external HDD for backup and storage.

name: Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: Ergonomic gaming mouse with adjustable DPI and RGB lighting.

name: Portable Projector
description: Mini projector for home cinema, supports 1080p and has built-in speaker.

name: Smart Light Bulbs (2-pack)
description: Dimmable LED smart bulbs, controlled via app or voice assistant.
